item.title: Autodiscover 101 : [MS-OXDISC] & [MS-OXDISCO]
item.description: 0. Autodiscover 101 : A brief introduction We will start this series by analysing the Autodiscover protocol which is being actively used by the differents Exchange endpoints. Based on the Microsoft documentation the Autodiscover sevice is part of the “Directory/Profile Services” which can be broke down into 2 important piece of documentation : [MS-OXDISCO] : Specifies the Autodiscover HTTP Protocol, which will provide a way for the “Autodiscover clients to find Autodiscover server” by extending the DNS and LDAP services.
